title: How to write a paragraph faster - Quora

response.answer_text: Draft the entirety based on ideas as they occur. Include the reasons, associations and examples. Fix the order afterward and possibly add transitions. If it is too long, break up into paragraphs and remove those that strayed off theme. Multiple paragraph types can also be attempted to find what makes the point most effectively. Similarly for essay types. Or, if it is too familiar, use a topic or point outline to find another angle. Speak if that is quickest. Each sentence tells the tale.
Write shorter paragraphs. But wait, why do you want to write paragraphs faster? And faster than what?
